REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0184 reute w f BC-ERICSSON-<ERICY>-WINS 03-11 0064

TEXT.TITLE: ERICSSON <ERICY> WINS ORDER FROM WEST GERMANY
TEXT.BODY: L.M. Ericsson Telephone Co of Sweden said it was awarded a 7.5 mln dlr contract to supply its Alfaskop computer terminals to the West German Bundespost, West Germany's telecommunications and postal administration. Ericsson said the contract covers 2,000 terminals, which will be used by West German post offices. Reuter
